content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches the fraction pi over 2, of the fraction the sine of x over x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction 4 over pi squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Determining Limits Using Algebraic Properties of Limits

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
